title: The Matrix
plot_summary: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

title: The Matrix Resurrections
plot_summary: Return to a world of two realities: one, everyday life; the other, what lies behind it. To find out if his reality is a construct, to truly know himself, Mr. Anderson will have to choose to follow the white rabbit once more.

title: The Matrix Reloaded
plot_summary: Freedom fighters Neo, Trinity and Morpheus continue to lead the revolt against the Machine Army, unleashing their arsenal of extraordinary skills and weaponry against the systematic forces of repression and exploitation.

title: The Matrix Revolutions
plot_summary: The human city of Zion defends itself against the massive invasion of the machines as Neo fights to end the war at another front while also opposing the rogue Agent Smith.

title: Free Your Mind: The Matrix Now
plot_summary: Experience The Matrix like in this mind-expanding live show, directed by Danny Boyle and with a dream team of top creatives including Es Devlin, Kenrick 'H2O' Sandy, Michael 'Mikey J' Asante and Sabrina Mahfouz behind the controls.

title: Matrix
plot_summary: Steven Matrix is one of the underworld's foremost hitmen until his luck runs out, and someone puts a contract out on him. title: The Matrix Awakens: An Unreal Engine 5 Experience
plot_summary: THE MATRIX AWAKENS: AN UNREAL ENGINE 5 EXPERIENCE' is a free, cutting-edge cinematic and open world interactive tech demo that combines the power of PlayStation®5 with UE5. An original concept written and cinematically directed by Lana Wachowski and James McTeigue, Keanu Reeves a... Read all

title: A Glitch in the Matrix
plot_summary: Documentary filmmaker Rodney Ascher tackles the question "are we living in a simulation?" with testimony, philosophical evidence and scientific explanation in his quest for the answer.

title: The Matrix Recalibrated
plot_summary: The making of The Matrix Revolutions is briefly touched on here in this documentary. Interviews with various cast and crew members inform us how they were affected by the deaths of Gloria Foster and Aaliyah, and also delve into the making of the visual effects that takes up a lot... Read all

title: Matrix: Generation
plot_summary: After the 1999 premiere of the first Matrix movie, it became a pop culture phenomenon. A special documentary about the Matrix saga and its prophetic aspects.

title: Enter the Matrix
plot_summary: The game's story picks up just before The Matrix Reloaded and runs parallel to that of the film. Bend the rules of the Matrix with martial arts, pilot the fastest hovercraft in the fleet, or just fight with lots of guns.

title: Threat Matrix
plot_summary: Special Agent John Kilmer leads an elite team on missions to eliminate terrorists and other threats as part of USA's Homeland Security force.

title: Making 'The Matrix'
plot_summary: A promotional making-of documentary for the film Matrix, The (1999) that devotes its time to explaining the digital and practical effects contained in the film. This is very interesting, seeing as how they're giving away the cinematic secrets that they created solely for the this... Read all

title: The Matrix Online
plot_summary: Set after 'The Matrix Revolutions' the Humans and Machines have peace but the Humans can jack into the Matrix and do missions and form factions/crews.

title: Armitage III: Poly-Matrix
plot_summary: Armitage is a brash cybernetic cop with a racy wardrobe who patrols a Mars metropolis. She and her stoic partner, Sylibus, risk everything to track a killer who is revealing his female victims' identities as highly-advanced androids.

title: The Matrix: Path of Neo
plot_summary: Play as Neo and battle your way through familiar fights and situations from the Matrix trilogy.

title: Armitage: Dual Matrix
plot_summary: Five years after the OAV series, Third series robot Naomi Armitage and her husband Ross Sylibus now live peacefully on Mars with their daughter, until a corporation wants to know the secrets of the third's ability to bear children.

title: Escape the Matrix
plot_summary: A man is trapped in a world with no purpose or substance. He begins to discover what the 'matrix' truly is and how he must make a choice to break free and start living real life.

title: Sex and the Matrix
plot_summary: A spoof created for the 2000 MTV Movie Awards, combining The Matrix and "Sex and the City".

title: The Immortals Redeemed
plot_summary: Real life story of a writer's struggle with Hollywood. The Immortals screenplay is pitched and the studio proceeds to steal and distort it. They release his work as The Matrix franchise. Madness, a ruse, a nightmare? You're gonna find out.

title: The Matrix Revisited
plot_summary: A DVD-exclusive documentary about the making and production of The Matrix (1999).

title: V-World Matrix
plot_summary: Two men enter a virtual reality simulator.

title: CR: Enter the Matrix
plot_summary: An arcade Pachinko machine featuring footage from the Matrix trilogy.

title: The Living Matrix
plot_summary: Our film, The Living Matrix - The Science of Healing, uncovers new ideas about the intricate web of factors that determine our health. title: Illuminati Matrix
plot_summary: Mankind has come a long way since he learned how to control fire. title: Matrix
plot_summary: Welcome to the matrix, is it illusion or is it reality? Find out in this powerful new documentary that explores the ultimate questions of life: where do we come from and what is the nature of reality itself. Plug into the Matrix: Are We Living In A Simulation.

title: Return to Source: Philosophy & The Matrix
Buhera mátrix
plot_summary: Among embarrassing images of his life that fell out of photo albums, he guides viewer and two baffled guardian protectors.

title: The Religion Matrix
plot_summary: Explores the various ways humanity is striving to find salvation. Take a journey through the various religions of the world and you will look at your life with a clearer vision.

plot_summary: Inspired by New York Magazine's biweekly pop culture roundup, 'The Approval Matrix' is a hilarious half-hour analysis of the most buzzed about topics out there. title: Matrix I
plot_summary: A piece of abstract cinema by John Whitney, to music by Catalan Spanish composer Padre Antonio Soler (1729-1783).

title: The Matrix Reloaded Revisited
plot_summary: A documentary film dedicated to the creation of The Matrix Reloaded

plot_summary: This new movie details news items that all people should be aware of such as the economic collapse of The United States and the formation of a New World Order. plot_summary: We join Gregg Braden, author of The Divine Matrix, in a comfortable setting as he explains the nature of the divine matrix. title: The Matrix Revolutions: Double Agent Smith
The Matrix, the Office Never-Before-Seen Cold Open
plot_summary: A exclusive, never-before-seen cold open from The Office's ninth season to celebrate The Office US coming to Peacock! In loving memory of Hugh Dane, Hank the security guard.

title: Escape From Zion: A Matrix Parody
plot_summary: Remember when Agent Smith interrogates Morpheus for the codes to get into Zion in 'The Matrix'? Well, it's been flipped =)

title: Matrix Isolation
plot_summary: During the Conoravirus outbreak worldwide, actors come together to show how the isolation is effecting them, as if we all live in the Matrix world..
